cards.title: Divine Harvest
cards.scenario: Priests claim the gods will bless this year’s crops. Shall we offer gifts to the temple?

cards.title: Restoration of the Temple
cards.scenario: The Great Temple is in disrepair. Will you allocate military resources for its restoration?

cards.title: Sacred Offerings
cards.scenario: A grand offering to the gods is proposed. Should we sponsor it with lavish gifts?

cards.title: Oracle’s Vision
cards.scenario: A revered oracle prophesies a glorious destiny—if you heed the gods’ demands. Do you listen?

cards.title: Priestly Reforms
cards.scenario: Corruption festers among the temple ranks. Shall we support the priests calling for reform?

cards.title: Mystical Ritual
cards.scenario: A rare celestial alignment is at hand. Funding a complex ritual could bring blessings.

cards.title: Temple Expansion
cards.scenario: Plans to enlarge the temple complex are laid out. Will you allocate resources?

cards.title: Eternal Blessing
cards.scenario: Your unwavering devotion has earned the gods’ everlasting favor.

cards.title: Divine Edict
cards.scenario: A holy decree cements the temple’s authority for generations.

cards.title: Sacred Legacy
cards.scenario: Your name is forever entwined with the pantheon, ensuring priestly loyalty.

cards.title: Royal Banquet
cards.scenario: The nobles request a lavish feast to honor your reign, but it may strain our military resources. Shall we proceed?

cards.title: Land Grants
cards.scenario: A noble family requests more land. Granting it could secure their loyalty.

cards.title: Trade Expedition
cards.scenario: A wealthy merchant proposes a trade mission abroad that requires a military escort for safe passage. Shall we sponsor it?

cards.title: Legal Dispute
cards.scenario: Two noble houses quarrel over inheritance. Shall we intervene?

cards.title: Lavish Tombs
cards.scenario: The nobles demand grand burial tombs to secure their legacy. Approve?

cards.title: Courtly Intrigue
cards.scenario: Rumors swirl of a noble plotting against you. Investigate?

cards.title: Marriage Alliance
cards.scenario: A powerful noble offers their child’s hand in marriage to cement alliances. Accept?

cards.title: Royal Succession
cards.scenario: Your careful alliances ensure a smooth transfer of power for generations.

cards.title: Merchant Guilds
cards.scenario: Trade flourishes under your patronage, bolstering the treasury across future reigns.

cards.title: House of Lords
cards.scenario: A council of nobles is established, limiting internal strife but also centralizing aristocratic power.

cards.title: Border Raids
cards.scenario: Barbarians threaten the farmers! Shall we divert military resources to reinforce the outposts?

cards.title: Conscription
cards.scenario: We need more soldiers. Shall we draft additional farmers?

cards.title: Warlord’s Challenge
cards.scenario: A rising general questions your rule. Will you confront him personally?

cards.title: Chariot Innovation
cards.scenario: A farmer unveils a new chariot design. Shall we support its production with military resources?

cards.title: Mercenary Deal
cards.scenario: A foreign band offers their service for gold. Shall we hire them?

cards.title: Desert Fortress
cards.scenario: Constructing a new fort in the desert could deter invaders. Approve the plan?

cards.title: Honoring Fallen Warriors
cards.scenario: Generals request a festival to honor the dead. Shall we host it?

cards.title: Imperial Command
cards.scenario: Your leadership cements the army’s loyalty, securing stability across future reigns.

cards.title: Warrior Pharaoh
cards.scenario: Your personal battle prowess becomes legend, inspiring future commanders.

cards.title: Fortified Borders
cards.scenario: Your defensive strategy stands the test of time, reducing future threats.

cards.title: Monument Construction
cards.scenario: A grand monument is planned. Shall we recruit extra workers from the farmlands?

cards.title: Agricultural Innovations
cards.scenario: New farming techniques promise higher yields. Will you invest in these methods?

cards.title: Irrigation Projects
cards.scenario: Ancient canals need restoration. Will you allocate military resources to boost the harvest?

cards.title: Grain Festival
cards.scenario: A bountiful harvest calls for celebration. Shall we host a festival for the workers?

cards.title: Worker’s Day
cards.scenario: A petition calls for an official holiday celebrating laborers. Will you declare it?

cards.title: Rural Reforms
cards.scenario: Proposals aim to reduce inequities in the countryside. Will you enact them?

cards.title: Feast of the Fields
cards.scenario: A grand celebration in the farmlands can mark a bountiful harvest. Shall we proceed?

cards.title: Eternal Harvest
cards.scenario: Your dedication to agriculture yields an everlasting bounty.

cards.title: Legacy of Prosperity
cards.scenario: Your reforms uplift the common folk, ensuring a strong foundation for generations.

cards.title: Cultural Roots
cards.scenario: A deep tradition takes root among the people, binding them to your dynasty.
